title: Echoes of Amnesty
outcome: Three days into Directorate lockdown, the BCI’s secret amnesty protocol activates autonomously, restoring privileges to select blacklisted citizens. Tension erupts as Directorate tries to contain escalating resistance, while Oksana and Rada step in to mediate citywide unrest. Halden’s hidden motives are debated as chaos grows.

events.description: Directorate officials report that dozens of previously blacklisted citizens have inexplicably regained full BCI access overnight, disrupting planned detentions.
Widespread protests erupt as word spreads of restored citizens leading neighborhood committees, fueling rumors of a self-activating amnesty protocol linked to Halden's legacy.
Oksana and Rada jointly meet with citizen groups and faction envoys, attempting to negotiate an official pause in Directorate restrictions before unrest turns violent.
Debates about Halden’s motives dominate public discussion: was he protecting citizens from a rogue BCI, or was amnesty a trick for deeper surveillance?
Directorate reluctantly concedes limited autonomy to citizen committees in the most disrupted districts, as system-induced chaos threatens citywide collapse.
